item.title: Notes：Converting data between wide and long format
item.description: 1.Problem You want to do convert data from a wide format to a long format. Many functions in R expect data to be in a long format rather than a wide format. Programs like SPSS, however, often use wide-formatted data. 2.Solution There are two sets of methods that are explained below: gather() and spread() from the tidyr package.
